review: I thought this stick was going to be a great addition to my internet viewing pleasure. Boy, was I wrong. It is a piece of crap! Streaming with it is a nightmare. It constantly starts and stops blaming low connectivity on my wifi. Odd, how I don't have that problem with my blu-ray DVD players or computer. I have high speed with century link which provides great service for all my other electronics. My advice, don't waste your money until they build a unit with storage capability that can handle your wifi load.
